ca.eandb.jmist.framework

Interface ShapePreservingTransformable2

  • All Superinterfaces:
    RigidBodyTransformable2, Rotatable2, Scalable, Translatable2
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AffineTransformable2
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AffineTransformation2, InvertibleAffineTransformation2, TransformableTexture2

    public interface ShapePreservingTransformable2
extends RigidBodyTransformable2, Scalable
    A two dimensional object to which shape preserving transformations (translation, rotations, uniform scaling) may be applied.
    Author:
    Brad Kimmel
